entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 08:52 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
